name: OpenSwitchMaps
description: Switch map services, and some useful links for OpenStreetMap contributors

scripts.dev: cp src/manifest_$TARGET.json src/manifest.json && parcel watch src/manifest.json --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dist/$TARGET
scripts.build: cp src/manifest_$TARGET.json src/manifest.json && parcel build src/manifest.json --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dist/$TARGET

author: tankaru
